content.query:
SELECT TOP 10 users.id, users.user_name, users.city, ISNULL(vipusers.id, 0)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://tfpurdwbpcrr.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/users/',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as users
LEFT JOIN OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://tfpurdwbpcrr.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/vipusers/',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as vipusers ON users.id = vipusers.id
